sn15.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn15.1:1.8: Pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn15.1:1.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso yam imasmim jambudipe tinakatthasakhapalasam tam chetva ekajjham samharitva caturangulam caturangulam ghatikam katva nikkhipeyya:
sn15.1:1.10: ‘ayam me mata, tassa me matu ayam mata’ti, apariyadinnava, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa matumataro assu, atha imasmim jambudipe tinakatthasakhapalasam parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya.
sn15.1:1.13: Pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn15.1:1.14: Evam digharattam vo, bhikkhave, dukkham paccanubhutam tibbam paccanubhutam byasanam paccanubhutam, katasi vaddhita.
sn15.1:1.15: Yavancidam, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasankharesu nibbinditum alam virajjitum alam vimuccitun”ti.
